++ Git Merge

+++ SUMMARY

* git command, used to integrate changes from one branch into another.
  * git merge <branch-name> 
    * integrates changes from "branch-name" into checked out branch
      * verify the checked out branch with "git branch" command

* if configured to do so git will automatically commit the merge changes to your active branch.
  * git can be configured to stage merges but not automatically commit 

* MergeConflict(s) will need to be manually resolved.
